text.info:
I graduated from the Pomorski Uniwersytet Medyczny w Szczecinie (Pomeranian Medical University in Szczecin) in 1994. Between 1994 and 2005 I worked in the Zachodniopomorskie Centrum Leczenia Ciężkich Oparzeń i Chirurgii Plastycznej (Pomeranian Centre for Treatment of Severe Burns and Plastic Surgery) in Gryfice, where I obtained both first and second degree specialization in general surgery and have been awarded the title of a Specialist in the General Surgery.

From 2005 till 2012 I worked in a leading-edge plastic surgery centre in Poland, namely in the Klinika Chirurgii Plastycznej (Plastic Surgery Clinic) in Polanica Zdrój. Here I educated myself under the supervision of dr Kazimierz Kobus and dr Ireneusz Łątkowski. In 2010 I have been awarded the title of a Plastic Surgery Specialist under the tutelage of dr Ireneusz Łątkowski.

Since 1999 I have been constantly dealing with plastic surgery. I have gained my experience both in Poland and abroad and I am still educating myself.

I am a member of Polskie Towarzystwo Chirurgii Plastycznej, Rekonstrukcyjnej i Estetycznej (Polish Association of Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery), Towarzystwo Chirurgów Polskich (Polish Surgeons Association) and Polskie Towarzystwo Leczenia Oparzeń (Polish Burns Treatment Association).

text.quote: Give every day the chance to become the most beautiful day of your life.

office-and-staff.content:
The clinic complies with the highest european quality standards. The clinic consists of:

  • preparatory room
  • operating room
  • post-operating room
  • dressing room
  • waiting room
  • utility room

Operating suite is equipped with modern high-tech surgical, anesthesiological and monitoring equipment. Surgical procedures are performed with the use of equipment such as advanced liposuction equipment, laser equipment for biological regeneration and rejuvenation, laser equipment for nonoperative wrinkle-removal and the like.

The clinic hires only highly skilled medical staff: anesthetist with second grade specialization, anesthesiological nurses and circulating nurses with several dozen years of experience. During the post-operative period all our patients remain under professional nursing care.
